page.title: 17THE JOHN BETJEMAN CENTRE
page.content: We should be proud to live in an area that has been so influential in the poetry of a{Poet Laureate}and that he chose to be buried here in Cornwall within a short distance of his cottage. {Wadebridge Concern for the Aged}has been preparing for 10 years to build a centre for retired people whose numbers grow even larger. Nobody likes to be thought to be old because most people feel young at heart though their bodies may show evidence of the passage of many many years. For this reason it was thought to be an appropriate idea to name our centre after{John Betjeman}and call it{The {John Betjeman Centre}.The centre will be comfortable and provide facilities for friendship and learning. { }
